lead_paragraph: An article on Saturday about La Caja Mágica, a new tennis complex in Madrid designed by the architect Dominique Perrault, misidentified the location of the new French National Library in Paris, which Perrault also designed. It is on the Left Bank of the Seine, not the Right Bank.
